Sentencas: The three-dimensional microstructure of an SOFC anode is quantified using a dual beam focused ion beam scanning electron microscopy (FIB-SEM) system equipped with an energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX) unit.
Titulo: Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique

Sentencas: The microstructure of the Ni-YSZ anode is virtually reconstructed in a computational field using a series of acquired two-dimensional SEM images.
Titulo: Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique

Sentencas: The three-phase boundary (TPB) density and tortuosity factors are carefully evaluated by applying two different evaluation methods to each parameter.
Titulo: Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique

Sentencas: The TPB density is estimated by a volume expansion method and a centroid method, while the tortuosity factors are evaluated by a random walk calculation and a lattice Boltzmann method (LBM).
Titulo: Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique

Sentencas: Estimates of each parameter obtained by the two methods are in good agreement with each other, thereby validating the reliability of the analysis methods proposed in this study.
Titulo: Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique
Quantification of SOFC anode microstructure based on dual beam FIB-SEM technique
